appearances.title: U.S. House of Representatives U.S. House of Representatives : CSPAN : January 12, 2026 3:00pm-6:09pm EST
appearances.snippet: again, i want to give my sincere thanks to both chairman jason smith as well as ranking member neal, for making agoa a bipartisan priority for this committee. i also would like to give a special thanks to the ways and means chief trade counsel alexander whitaker, for her tireless efforts on this issue. i strongly urge all of my colleagues to vote for this bill and to send a strong signal to our african allies that leaders in congress, both republicans and democrats, respect and value our continued partnership. i reserve the balance of my time. >> the gentlewoman reserves and the gentleman from missouri is recognized. >> i yield three minutes to the gentleman from nebraska, mr. smith. >> the gentleman is recognized for three minutes. >> thank you, madam speaker. i appreciate the diligent work of the full committee. chairman smith, to prioritize this issue. we have an opportunity to advance the bipartisan legacy of the african growth and opportunity act, a program which has been a pillar of u.s. trade and economic engagement throughout sub-saharan africa. as we all know, trade requires
